explanation: [0-0] A left wrist wears a blue watch with a unique design, featuring a circular raised section in the center. The watch strap is white, and a right hand is placed on the left wrist, with the thumb pressing the button of the watch. Some green plants and a brick floor can be seen in the background. The white words "STAN HANRAHAN" and a red button logo are displayed at the top of the screen.

[0-6] Then, the right thumb presses the button on the watch, and the circular raised area on the watch begins to glow. A four-legged animal flashes inside, then the image zooms in. The right hand rotates the circular protrusion on the blue watch, and the animal inside changes.

[10-16] Then, the right hand is removed, and the left wrist is lifted, followed by a flash of light. The scene then switches to a blue robot with a glowing center in its chest, standing in front of numerous palm trees. Subsequently, the robot's chest starts to glow, and the blue robot transforms into a blue ripple of light. As the ripple disappears, the left wrist wearing the blue watch reappears, and the right hand grasps the left wrist again, with the thumb positioned on the watch button.
